sentences.pinyin: wǒ yào xià lóu qù chāo shì.
sentences.translation: I need to go downstairs to the supermarket.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于电梯坏了，我不得不走楼梯下楼去买东西。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於電梯壞了，我不得不走樓梯下樓去買東西。
sentences.pinyin: yóu yú diàn tī huài le, wǒ bù dé bù zǒu lóu tī xià lóu qù mǎi dōng xi.
sentences.translation: Because the elevator was broken, I had no choice but to take the stairs to go downstairs to buy stuff.
